abstract: Are the Buffalo Bills really that good? Are the Indianapolis Colts really that bad? Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer readers' questions this week.
snippet: Are the Buffalo Bills really that good? Are the Indianapolis Colts really that bad? Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer readers' questions this week.

headline.main: Have a Question for N.F.L. Reporter Judy Battista?
